stories.text:
I don't want to pin it on social media, but of late I'm losing the ability to focus attention on a single task. I find constantly distracted, erratic, and shifting between apps, opening instagram, etc.

I tried looking for solutions online but suggestions like 'delete instagram' didn't work. I'm just replacing it with something else.

Did anyone face this issue? How do you resolve it?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to improve focus and reduce distractions?
Algorithm accurately predicts when teens have suicidal thoughts, behavior

Show HN: SixArm company consulting agreement v3.0 – GPL/CC developer contract

stories.text:
This is dope, someone made a solution that works like lightning and is usb-c aswell. The whole solution is tucked inside the phone body.

https://github.com/kenp-io/not-for-iphone-usb-c/tree/master/ip-x

BTW: the prototype is on eBay for 100'000 USD (started at 1 USD), I just hope it's not someone from Cupertino :-D

https://www.ebay.com/bfl/viewbids/165161363347?item=165161363347
